row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 5)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
row_desc: Queen returned to the competition during any season.
Queen has at least two lip sync wins.
Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
